name: Space Wars
description: Space Wars is an exciting high action 2D space shooter developed in the Unity 3D engine. It is exciting in the classical sense with power-ups, high-scores, scrolling backgrounds, and tons of enemy ships. Features include homing missiles, bubble shields, laser beams, and many more. It is an exciting game that is challenging but also fair. It is your job to restore peace and prosperity to galaxy X and defeat the Tyrannical Empire. Only the true heroes will prevail from this bullet hell!!!!! Instructions to play: F key to fire weapons and arrow keys to move ship. Enjoy!!!!!
